time to move on." David Cameron praises` professional' Andy Coulson In a statement Mr David Cameron praised him as a "brillIan Edmondsont member of my team" . The prime minister said: I am very sorry that Andy Coulson has decided to resign as my director of communications, although I understand that the continuing pressures on him and his family mean that he feels compelled to do so. " Andy Coulson has told me that the focus on him was impeding his ability to do his job and was starting to prove a distraction for the government.
